prereq.note: The Eucalyptus User Console package is installed with the Eucalyptus repositories. The following instruction assumes that you're installing the console on a server that's already running Eucalyptus. If you're installing the console on a stand-alone machine, please see the Eucalyptus Installation Guide to set up the Eucalyptus repositories before following the instructions below.

The version of the user console you're running should be the same as the version of Eucalyptus you're running. Running a user console against a Eucalyptus installtion with a different version is unsupported.
